info.title: Business Situation - Read
info.description: This API is based on the OData protocol. It provides the situation instance and context data in the payloadâ€™s response. This includes the situation instance ID, situation creation time, situation status, situation type ID, situation template ID, situation anchor and trigger object key, anchor object, data context ID, data context, data context creation time, situation activity ID, and situation activity. The payload data can then be consumed, for example, by advanced analytics or automation. It also updates the situation action status for automation.

x-sap-shortText: Read situation instance and context data or update the situation action status using this synchronous inbound service

get.summary: Reads the data context for situation instance activities.
get.description: Reads all context data that is available for situation instance activities in JSON format and reads additional information. This information includes the time stamp of the data context, the data context ID, the situation instance ID, the anchor object, the trigger object, the instance status, the activities performed for the instance, as well as the situation template and the situation type it is based on.

post.summary: Updates the status of an action performed for a situation instance.
post.description: Sends the information available for an action that was performed on a situation, such as the action instance ID, situation instance ID, action ID, action status (SUCCESS or FAILURE), and the target instance status (Open, Resolved, or Unchanged).

parameters.name: SitnActionInstanceID
parameters.description:
Unique action instance ID generated by the service client  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

parameters.name: SitnActionID
parameters.description:
ActionID defined by situation template, NO_ACTION or UNKNOWN  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

parameters.name: SitnActionStatus
parameters.description:
Action status: SUCCESS or FAILURE  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

parameters.name: SitnInstanceID
parameters.description:
Situation instance ID for which the action was performed  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

parameters.name: SitnInstceTargetStatus
parameters.description:
Target instance status: OP(Open) RE(Resolved) UN(Unchanged)  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)
